name: World Championship Athletics
description:
The battle for Gold Medals and personal bests ignites excitement and healthy competition in World Championship Athletics.

Millimeters and split seconds will decide the winners. Athletes compete in 28 summer time disciplines, including hurdles, high diving, javelin and pole vault.

Customize your character and develop your career as a professional athlete in career mode or challenge your friends in head-to-head competition.

Features

• Compatible with the Wii Balance Board
• Create and develop your own athlete
• Tons of nationalities to choose from|
• Compete in 28 different events
• Up to 4 players splitscreen or hotseat
• Innovative controls simulate real events
